favourite.article: Amen, Lord, Thank You for all Your saints & churches on earth today 2016! Blend us into one! Matt. 16:18a! one heart! beholding YOU! in the reality of YOUR newness now! to YOU! & wanting just our Beloved only God:):)

Lord, I turn my heart away unto You. Fill me with Yourself and nothing else. I want to find you living each day, in my spirit, and I know Your Holy Spirit is mingled with mine. How beautiful You are! Blend our hearts together, make all things new.
This is a moving..prayerful..sweet song..stirs my heart to pray more.. to yield more..to love the Lord Jesus more. Thank you Lord
